nodes.text: The Relby K-25 blaster was a reconfigurable police blaster notably used by the Police Force in the city of Canto Bight.

The K-25 had a default pistol configuration, a heavy configuration that attached a long-range macroscope and power enhancing barrel, and a rifle configuration that paired a noise-suppressing and range extending barrel along with an adjustable stock that held additional ammunition.
These blasters were used in the arrest of Rose Tico and Finn for their illegal parking on the beach.
